text: {{(() => { const capacity = Number(inpCapacity.text) || 1; const changeover = Number(inpChangeover.text) || 0; const data = getCuttingList.data || []; const ws = getWorkSchedule.data || []; const rateM3PerMin = capacity / 480; const dm = {}; ws.forEach(d => { if (d.is_working) { const s = d.start_time.split(':'); const e = d.end_time.split(':'); dm[+d.day_order] = { sh: +s[0], sm: +s[1], av: +e[0]*60 + +e[1] - +s[0]*60 - +s[1] }; } }); if (!Object.keys(dm).length) return 'No work schedule â€” configure working days on the Work Schedule page'; if (!data.length) return 'No items in cutting list'; const sd = dpStartDate.selectedDate; if (!sd) return 'Select a start date above'; const jsOrd = dt => dt.getDay() === 0 ? 7 : dt.getDay(); let cur = new Date(String(sd).substring(0, 10) + 'T00:00:00'); let g = 0; while (!dm[jsOrd(cur)] && g++ < 14) cur = new Date(cur.getTime() + 86400000); let elapsed = 0; let lastDate = null; let lastFm = 0; data.forEach((row, idx) => { const prev = idx > 0 ? data[idx-1] : null; const coMins = (prev && (row.timber !== prev.timber || row.profile !== prev.profile)) ? changeover : 0; const itemMins = Number(row.volume_m3) / rateM3PerMin; const needed = coMins + itemMins; let di = dm[jsOrd(cur)]; let dg = 0; while (elapsed > 0 && elapsed + needed > di.av && dg++ < 14) { cur = new Date(cur.getTime() + 86400000); let g2 = 0; while (!dm[jsOrd(cur)] && g2++ < 14) cur = new Date(cur.getTime() + 86400000); elapsed = 0; di = dm[jsOrd(cur)]; } elapsed += coMins + itemMins; lastDate = new Date(cur); lastFm = di.sh * 60 + di.sm + elapsed; }); const tc = data.filter((r,i) => i>0 && (r.timber !== data[i-1].timber || r.profile !== data[i-1].profile)).length; let totalMins = 0; data.forEach((row, idx) => { if (idx>0 && (row.timber !== data[idx-1].timber || row.profile !== data[idx-1].profile)) totalMins += changeover; totalMins += Number(row.volume_m3) / rateM3PerMin; }); return 'Est. Finish: ' + String(lastDate.getDate()).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + String(lastDate.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + lastDate.getFullYear() + ' ' + String(Math.floor(lastFm/60)).padStart(2,'0') + ':' + String(Math.round(lastFm%60)).padStart(2,'0') + '   (' + data.length + ' cuts, ' + tc + ' changeovers, ' + Math.round(totalMins) + ' mins total)'; })()}}
